description: A man's body is found in hospital toilets hours after officers began investigating a woman's murder.
title: Police link death at flat with body find at Hinchingbrooke
title_page: Police link death at flat with body find at Hinchingbrooke - BBC News
maintext:
The suspected murder of a woman found dead at a flat has been linked by police to the subsequent discovery of a man's body in hospital toilets.
Officers found the body of a woman, who is yet to be named, in a property in Saunders Close, Huntingdon, Cambridgeshire, at about 17:00 GMT on Wednesday.
As inquiries into her death continued, police were called to Hinchingbrooke Hospital, where staff found a man's body in public toilets.
Police said they were linking the man's death with the murder investigation and were not looking for anyone else in connection with the deaths.
